topic.label: Download - How obtain and install CIMTool.
Getting Started - How to create a project.
Export from Enterprise Architect - How to get a schema in compatible XMI form.
Interpreting and Displaying UML - How CIMTool interprets UML models as OWL ontologies and the conventions used for displaying them.
Multiple Profiles from a CIM Class - How to create several different restricted classes for a given CIM class.
Enumerations in Profiles - How to include enumerated classes in a profile.
Namespace Support - How to use namespaces to manage multiple CIM extensions and profiles.
Namespace Background - An explanation and discussion of namespaces.
Validating CIM/XML - How to validate CIM/XML documents and Incremental CIM/XML documents against a profile with special reference to the CPSM profile.
Validation Test Suite - A full suite of CIM/XML validation test cases and how to use them.
OWL as a Profile Language - An specification of CIMTool's representation of a profile in OWL.
Validation Rule Language - An overview of the rule language used used for validation of CIM/XML and how to customise the standard rules.
CIMTool ChangeLog - A summary of changes and new features in this version.
